trans-unit.source: The type of the objects to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的对象的类型。

trans-unit.source: The first object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第一个对象。

trans-unit.source: The second object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第二个对象。

trans-unit.source: Represents the method that compares two objects of the same type.
trans-unit.target: 表示用于比较相同类型的两个对象的方法。

trans-unit.source: A signed integer that indicates the relative values of <paramref name="x" /> and <paramref name="y" />, as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 一个有符号整数，指示 <paramref name="x" /> 和 <paramref name="y" /> 的相对值，如下表所示。

trans-unit.source: <list type="table"><listheader><term> Value
trans-unit.target: <list type="table"><listheader><term> 值

trans-unit.source: </term><description> Meaning
trans-unit.target: </term><description> 含义

trans-unit.source: </description></listheader><item><term> Less than 0
trans-unit.target: </description></listheader><item><term> 小于 0

trans-unit.source: </term><description><paramref name="x" /> is less than <paramref name="y" />.
trans-unit.target: </term><description><paramref name="x" /> 小于 <paramref name="y" />。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> 0
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> 0

trans-unit.source: </term><description><paramref name="x" /> equals <paramref name="y" />.
trans-unit.target: </term><description><paramref name="x" /> 等于 <paramref name="y" />。

trans-unit.source: </description></item><item><term> Greater than 0
trans-unit.target: </description></item><item><term> 大于 0

trans-unit.source: </term><description><paramref name="x" /> is greater than <paramref name="y" />.
trans-unit.target: </term><description><paramref name="x" /> 大于 <paramref name="y" />。

trans-unit.source: This delegate is used by the <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Comparison%7B%60%600%7D%29> method overload of the <xref:System.Array> class and the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601.Sort%28System.Comparison%7B%600%7D%29> method overload of the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> class to sort the elements of an array or list.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用此委托<xref:System.Array.Sort%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Comparison%7B%60%600%7D%29>方法重载的<xref:System.Array>类和<xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601.Sort%28System.Comparison%7B%600%7D%29>方法重载的<xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>类以对数组或列表的元素进行排序。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Comparison%601> delegate with the <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601.Sort%28System.Comparison%7B%600%7D%29> method overload.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何将<xref:System.Comparison%601>委托以及<xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601.Sort%28System.Comparison%7B%600%7D%29>方法重载。

trans-unit.source: The code example defines an alternative comparison method for strings, named `CompareDinosByLength`.
trans-unit.target: 代码示例定义了命名的字符串替换比较方法`CompareDinosByLength`。

trans-unit.source: This method works as follows: First, the comparands are tested for `null`, and a null reference is treated as less than a non-null.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的工作方式如下： 首先，测试比较是否为`null`，并为空引用被视为小于非空。

trans-unit.source: Second, the string lengths are compared, and the longer string is deemed to be greater.
trans-unit.target: 其次，比较字符串的长度，和较长的字符串被认为更高版本。

trans-unit.source: Third, if the lengths are equal, ordinary string comparison is used.
trans-unit.target: 第三，如果长度相等，则使用普通字符串比较。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601> of strings is created and populated with four strings, in no particular order.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Collections.Generic.List%601>的字符串创建并填充了四个字符串，顺序不分先后。

trans-unit.source: The list also includes an empty string and a null reference.
trans-unit.target: 列表还包括一个空字符串和 null 引用。

trans-unit.source: The list is displayed, sorted using a <xref:System.Comparison%601> generic delegate representing the `CompareDinosByLength` method, and displayed again.
trans-unit.target: 显示的列表，使用排序<xref:System.Comparison%601>泛型委托表示`CompareDinosByLength`方法，然后再次显示。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Comparison%601> delegate to sort the elements of a collection of `CityInfo` objects.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Comparison%601>委托的集合的元素进行排序`CityInfo`对象。

trans-unit.source: `CityInfo` is an application-defined class that contains information about a city and its population.
trans-unit.target: `CityInfo` 是一个包含城市和它的人口数量有关的信息的应用程序定义类。

trans-unit.source: The example defines three methods, `CompareByName`, `CompareByPopulation`, and `CompareByNames`, that offer three different ways of ordering the `CityInfo` objects.
trans-unit.target: 该示例定义了三种方法， `CompareByName`， `CompareByPopulation`，和`CompareByNames`，可进行的排序的三种不同方式`CityInfo`对象。

trans-unit.source: Each method is assigned to the `comparison` argument of the <xref:System.Array.Sort%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Comparison%7B%60%600%7D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 每个方法分配给`comparison`参数<xref:System.Array.Sort%60%601%28%60%600%5B%5D%2CSystem.Comparison%7B%60%600%7D%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。
